content:
TextCompositionManager Class

In this Article

Provides facilities for managing events related to input and text compositions.

Syntax

Declaration

public sealed class TextCompositionManager : System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject
  • TextCompositionManager

Methods

  • AddPreviewTextInputHandler(DependencyObject,TextCompositionEventHandler)

    Adds a handler for the stem.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.PreviewTextInput attached event.

    public static void AddPreviewTextInputHandler (System.Windows.DependencyObject element, System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionEventHandler handler);

    Parameters

    • element
      DependencyObject

      A dependency object to add the event handler to. The dependency object must be a UIElement or a ContentElement.

    • handler
      TextCompositionEventHandler

      A delegate that designates the handler to add.

    Remarks

    This method adds a handler for the tunneling version of this event. For information about the bubbling version of this event, see <xref:System.Windows.Input.TextCompositionManager.TextInput>.

  • CompleteComposition(TextComposition)

    Completes a specified text composition.

    public static bool CompleteComposition (System.Windows.Input.TextComposition composition);

    Parameters

    • composition
      TextComposition

      A TextComposition object to complete.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if the text composition was successfully completed; otherwise, false.

    Exceptions

    • ArgumentNullException

      Raised when composition is null.

    • ArgumentException

      Raised when there is no input manager associated with composition, or when the text composition is already marked as completed.
